title: VC School: What’s a venture scale business + Matt Duesterberg of OhmConnect | E1499
description: For today's VC Sunday School, Molly asks Jason about what makes a venture scale business (2:20). Then, for This Week in Climate Startups, Molly sits down with Matt Duesterberg, co-founder of OhmConnect (19:38).
